page.shortlink: grid detail images display options pre-fetch data for detail view property
page.description: If you choose this option, it will take a little longer for the page to display initially, but then once the page has displayed, clicking on a Detail View link will display the Detail View immediately (without a server round trip). Your browser will use JavaScript to populate the Detail View from the pre-fetched data.
page.important: If your Detail View has any 'Custom' controls you should not use the pre-fetch option.
